item.description: A few of us in the group hung out yesterday and decided that we wanted to go out and celebrate NYE without having to spend a ton of money. I did some research and Clarke's in Fanueil Hall is only charging a $10 cover to get in and they'll even provide a champagne toast at midnight! So, if you weren't able to get into the Liberty bash or just don't want to break your bank tonight, join us!
item.name: Celebrate NYE tonight without spending a ton of $$!!!
